Class VideoService

java.lang.Object
musicApp.services.VideoService
public class VideoService extends Object
A utility service for extracting images and artwork from video and image files.

      public VideoService()

  • Method Details

    • getFirstFrame

      public javafx.scene.image.Image getFirstFrame(File videoFile) throws Exception
      Extracts the very first frame from a mp4 video file and returns it as a JavaFX Image.
      Parameters:
      videoFile - the video file to process
      Returns:
      the first frame of the video as a JavaFX Image, or null if no frame was found
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during video processing

    • imageToArtwork

      public org.jaudiotagger.tag.images.Artwork imageToArtwork(javafx.scene.image.Image image) throws Exception
      Converts a JavaFX Image to a Jaudiotagger Artwork instance using a temporary file.
      Parameters:
      image - the image to convert
      Returns:
      the generated Artwork object
      Throws:
      Exception - if the image cannot be converted or written to file

    • getArtworkFromFile

      public org.jaudiotagger.tag.images.Artwork getArtworkFromFile(File file) throws Exception
      Creates an Artwork from a file.

      If the file is a video (e.g., .mp4), the first frame is extracted and used as artwork. Otherwise, the file is assumed to be an image and passed directly to ArtworkFactory.

      Parameters:
      file - the image or video file
      Returns:
      an Artwork representation of the visual content
      Throws:
      Exception - if the artwork cannot be created or video processing fails

    • tempFileFromBytes

      public File tempFileFromBytes(byte[] rawVideo) throws Exception
      Writes raw video bytes to a temporary MP4 file on disk.
      Parameters:
      rawVideo - the raw video data as a byte array
      Returns:
      a File reference to the newly created temporary video file
      Throws:
      Exception - if writing the file fails

    • tempFileFromImage

      private File tempFileFromImage(javafx.scene.image.Image image) throws IOException
      Writes a JavaFX Image to a temporary PNG file on disk.
      Parameters:
      image - the JavaFX image to save
      Returns:
      a File reference to the temporary file
      Throws:
      IOException - if the image cannot be written
